column1: Art Institute of Chicago////MAN I love this place! The art is beautifully displayed and I love the new rules they implemented recently that allow everyone to take pictures of everything (just avoid flash). The gift shop has great finds for both yourself and friends
column2: and admission is very affordable (and some days it is even free!). It's a great place to come with friends
column4: or just alone to soak up some good old artsy goodness. I'll definetly be back again and again!
